<li>post-bacterial disorder（99.3%）</li>
<li>post-infectious syndrome（99.3%）</li>
<li>infective urethral stricture（99.3%）</li>
<li>Chagas cardiomyopathy（99.3%）</li>
<li>otitis externa（99.3%）</li>

</ul>
